verses.name: Luke 10:6
verses.text: And if the son of peace be there, your peace shall rest upon it: if not, it shall turn to you again.

verses.name: Luke 10:7
verses.text: And in the same house remain, eating and drinking such things as they give: for the labourer is worthy of his hire. Go not from house to house.

verses.name: Luke 10:8
verses.text: And into whatsoever city ye enter, and they receive you, eat such things as are set before you:

verses.name: Luke 10:9
verses.text: And heal the sick that are therein, and say unto them, The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you.
